title: Recomendations for San Francisco ISP?
content:
Even though the “General Discussions’  descriptor says ’Anything goes’ I noticed most of the entries are still type orientated, so I am not sure if my post is appropriate or not. Anyway...

I am moving to San Francisco and was wondering if any of the SF locals could recommend a reputable ISP I could use.

If not another site or forum I could ask.

Thank you in advance.

 [‹ Wooden bookbinding and titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16145 "Go to previous forum topic") [Souvenir ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14173 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jem
